body_html:
@hlzz I believe _ in generated ops like (get_nn_ops) is not needed anymore so I think it is worth to give gen_nn_ops.max_pool_v2 a try (caution: I haven't tried it myself yet).

PR #14983 was reverted because it caused some issues with MKL. I don't have a lot of experience with MKL, but will give it a try if I had a chance.
body_text:
@hlzz I believe _ in generated ops like (get_nn_ops) is not needed anymore so I think it is worth to give gen_nn_ops.max_pool_v2 a try (caution: I haven't tried it myself yet).
PR #14983 was reverted because it caused some issues with MKL. I don't have a lot of experience with MKL, but will give it a try if I had a chance.
body:
@hlzz I believe `_` in generated ops like (`get_nn_ops`) is not needed anymore so I think it is worth to give `gen_nn_ops.max_pool_v2` a try (caution: I haven't tried it myself yet).

PR #14983 was reverted because it caused some issues with MKL. I don't have a lot of experience with MKL, but will give it a try if I had a chance.
